CDC-2025-0024-0193 2025-06-11 Comment from Ruelas, Carmen
Opposition to Removing COVID-19 Vaccines / Support for Continued Access Support for Strong Vaccine Recommendations for Vulnerable Groups
 None Hello. I understand that this meeting is to vote on vaccine recommendations, and I'm writing because I am concerned that the current vaccines for Covid-19 will not be updated and easily available for whoever wants them. All vaccines should continue to be monitored (there were already systems in pla... 1 1:1 Please, please do not make it harder for people to access one of the few tools they have to protect themselves and their family from Covid. The commenter expresses a strong commitment to ensuring continued access to COVID-19 vaccines, highlighting the importance of vaccination in keeping people safe. They advocate for the need for routine updates and monitoring of vaccines, especially as COVID-19 continues to pose significant risks, particularly to vulnerable groups like children who cannot be vaccinated.

Support for Removing COVID-19 Vaccines From the Market Support for Disclosing Conflicts of Interest and Transparency
 None ACIP ‚Äì Want to Regain the Public‚Äôs Trust? I urge ACIP members to take a firm stance for public health and remove all currently licensed COVID shots from the market. In 1976, the swine flu vaccine was immediately pulled after approximately 25 people died following vaccination. As of May 30, 2025, the... 1 1:1 I urge ACIP members to take a firm stance for public health and remove all currently licensed COVID shots from the market. The commenter expresses a clear position advocating for the removal of all currently licensed COVID shots from the market due to concerns about safety and the need to regain public trust. Additionally, they call for rigorous research standards for all vaccines, highlighting a demand for transparency in vaccine approval processes.
CDC-2025-0024-0991 2025-06-17 Comment from Anonymous
Opposition to Removing COVID-19 Vaccines / Support for Continued Access
 None Covid vaccines must remain available to all Americans regardless of age or risk profile. There is no reason to change the rules on a process that has existed for many years now, and make no mistake, making the vaccine harder to get will only result in more covid cases and deaths. 1 1:1 Covid vaccines must remain available to all Americans regardless of age or risk profile. There is no reason to change the rules on a process that has existed for many years now. The comment clearly expresses the necessity of keeping COVID-19 vaccines available to all individuals and opposes any changes that would restrict access, indicating a strong support for continued COVID-19 vaccination.

D... 1 1:1 Do not underestimate the importance of continuing to allow everyone to get COVID-19 vaccines. The commenter emphasizes the critical necessity of access to COVID-19 vaccines, arguing that it affects individual freedom, public health, and the economy. They advocate against restrictions on vaccination as detrimental to societal wellbeing, reflecting a stance that prioritizes individual choice regarding vaccinations.

Hello, I am writing because long before the pandemic, I went down a rabbit hole learning about vaccines and i... 1 1:1 Everyone in our household gets a yearly Covid booster to protect someone we love very much from having an even lower quality of life. The commenter expresses a strong desire for continued access to COVID-19 vaccines and emphasizes their importance in protecting vulnerable individuals in their household, particularly in the context of Long Covid. Additionally, there is an implied support for maintaining expert guidance in the ACIP, given the reference to the importance of vaccine recommendations backed by scientific findings.
CDC-2025-0024-6054 2025-06-19 Comment from Thornton, Walter
Support for Removing COVID-19 Vaccines From the Market Support for Disclosing Conflicts of Interest and Transparency
Call for Rigorous Vaccine Testing Standards
 ACIP ‚Äì Want to Regain the Public‚Äôs Trust? I urge ACIP members to take a firm stance for public health and remove all currently licensed COVID shots from the market. In 1976, the swine flu vaccine was immediately pulled after approximately 25 people died following vaccination. As of May 30, 2025, the... 1 1:1 I urge ACIP members to take a firm stance for public health and remove all currently licensed COVID shots from the market. The comment explicitly calls for the removal of all COVID-19 vaccines from the market and highlights concerns about trust and safety, which corresponds to a strong stance against the current COVID vaccine policy. Additionally, it emphasizes the need for rigorous testing standards for all vaccines, which represents a new perspective not covered by the existing stances.

Additionally, concerns about the removal of previous ACIP members reflect a desire for expert input in vaccine policy, indicating support for retaining knowledgeable members on the panel.

In 1976, the swine flu vaccine was immediately pulled after approximately 25 people died following vaccination. The commenter expresses a clear stance advocating for the removal of all licensed COVID vaccines, citing reported deaths and referencing historical precedents as justification. They also call for rigorous testing standards before vaccine approval, conveying the need for transparency and reliability in vaccine research.
